column4: i have one more question and after this i'll go away for a few hours,

i tried editing xorg.conf
but to no avail
What video card..
9800pro
How did you install the ati drivers
uh..... i havent installed any, i just did the base install
!ati > Jamminpotato
not ati is better than me?
what?

I also need to go in a minute

9800 pro WHAT
what do you mean its an ati radeon 9800pro
